task.title: How to Become an "Administrator" on a Company LinkedIn Page: Steps for a Current Admin
task.shortdesc: In order for a new employee to become an "administrator" on a company LinkedIn page, a current individual that is classified as such on the page needs to facilitate the new hires efforts.

taskbody.prereq: The new hire should have requested to connect with you on LinkedIn, and you will need to have accepted the connection to complete these instructions successfully.

step.cmd: Open the LinkedIn homepage on a web browser, navigate to the company page and click "Settings".
Type in the name of the LinkedIn user (name of the new hire) that you are adding as an administrator.
Assign their role as "Super Admin" and then press save.
Alert the new hire that they have been added as an administrator and they may complete the rest of the required instructions.
